title: Caroline Flack admits she's struggling with anxiety and is in a 'really weird place'
text:
Caroline Flack has spoken about her struggles with mental health in a candid post.

The Love Island host, 39, discussed her battle with anxiety as she confessed that she had not been feeling well in the past few weeks, and was betrayed when she spoke out about her emotions.

Taking to Instagram on Monday, Caroline admitted that although she finds her feelings hard to discuss, she was speaking out in a bid to inspire her 2.3 million followers to be kinder to one another.

Candid: Caroline Flack has spoken about her struggles with mental health. The Love Island host, 39, discussed her battle with anxiety as she confessed that she had not been feeling well

Caroline explained: 'I wanted to write something about mental health day last week but I was knee deep in work. And some days it’s hard to write your feelings of your not in the right place.

'The last few weeks I’ve been in a really weird place... I find it hard to talk about it .. I guess it’s anxiety and pressure of life ... and when I actually reached out to someone they said I was draining. I feel like this is why some people keep their emotions to themselves.

'I certainly hate talking about my feelings. And being a burden is my biggest fear.... I’m lucky to be able to pick myself up when things feel s**t. But what happens if someone can’t . Be nice to people. You never know what’s going on . Ever'.

Speaking out: Taking to Instagram on Monday, Caroline admitted that although she finds her feelings hard to discuss, she was speaking out in a bid to inspire her 2.3 million followers to be kinder to one another.

Caroline previously revealed she struggles with her anxiety more when she has free time.

Speaking on Loose Women last year, she explained: 'Weirdly the anxiety I got more when I'm not working. Work takes away my anxiety, doing live TV takes away anything else. Being on stage I'm less nervous than just being me.'

Revealing that she often has hypnotherapy sessions, she added: 'Everyone's different, if I'm going through a bit of a tough time I can just call him and say "hey can I come over and see you?"'

Cute couple: Caroline's candid post came after she returned from a holiday in Spain with boyfriend, Lewis Burton, 27 [pictured in August]

Caroline's candid post came after she returned from a holiday in Spain with boyfriend, Lewis Burton, 27.

On their blossoming relationship, a source recently told The Sun: 'Caroline and Lewis were introduced through mutual friends and have really hit it off.

'They’ve been on several dates now and are getting on really well. Lewis has been a true gent to Caroline and has patiently waited to see her. They feel comfortable in each other’s company and it seems to be going in the right direction.'

However, during their romantic getaway the pair were pictured in a furious argument whilst on a boat trip.

Upon her return to England, Caroline shared on Instagram: 'Back from holiday... not quite as relaxing as I thought but ready to jump back into work! NEWWWWW JOB THIS WEEK... all to be revealed soon'.
